text: :white_check_mark: Poll successfully deleted.

Hi guys, does anyone have experience with editing SVG text? We need to amend some text on an SVG a previous developer made but we're having some trouble figuring it out
<https://www.geoteric.com/>
Any advice would be appreciated :slightly_smiling_face:

Talking about the rotateable disk (_Closing The Loop_)? The text in there is actually a path, making it somewhat difficult to change it (opposed to the `<text>` element; <https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Element/text>).
you'd have to load the svg image in a vector graphics program (illustrator eg.) and add the text manually there
or you could strip the group that encapsulates the text paths and insert a `<text>` element manually
It's editing the segment text themselves. Got a designer to remake the wheel with the new text, so pretty much managed to solve this now, just a pain to amend
Thanks for your advice :thumbsup:
yw :slightly_smiling_face:
<@U9MAWTESW> you can have live text in an svg but you must load the font in you webpage as well.
Or people will see the text in the default system font
YEAH !!!!!
My client has changed CORS acceptation and it's now working with

Hello guys, I need put these character on rich text {% some text %}, Some idea about, how to escape it?
`{% raw %} {% sometext %}  {% endraw %}`
anything inside of the `raw` tag will not get parsed
by hubl
Hey <@U6XDD2SAW>, any code that you need to escape can be wrapped in `{% raw %} {% some text that you're escaping %} {% endraw %}`
Lol, beat me to it <@U38EZFVFE>
fasted guns in the west
:face_with_cowboy_hat:
<@U38EZFVFE> <@UE24LMGSZ>, Thank you

Not sure if this is the right place to ask this, but I'm wondering what the proper way to add a javascript library to a HubSpot site is. I'm needing to use clipboard.js.
I've used single files before, but never an entire library.
